=Port Scan=

Provides a basic port scanner which shows which ports are open on the target sites.<br>

Port scanning is configured using the [HelpAddonsPortscanOptions Options Port Scan screen]. 
<br>
==Pop up menu item==
===Port Scan host===
This will initiate a port scan of the host for the selected node. <br>The [HelpAddonsPortscanTab Port Scan tab] will be display and will show the progress of the scan. <br><br>
==Accessed via==
<table>
<tr><td></td><td>Port Scan tab</td><td></td></tr>
<tr><td></td><td>Sites tab</td><td>'Attack/Port Scan host' right click menu item</td></tr>
</table>
